alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 18 at 2:33PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Desha, northeastern Drew, southeastern Lincoln and southeastern Arkansas Counties through 315 PM CST... At 232 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Monticello, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dumas... Mitchellville... Watson... Winchester... Yancopin... Omega... Mills... Merrisach Lake... Trusten Holder WMA... Kelso... Arkansas Post... Garrett Bridge... Pendleton... Gourd... Florence... Tyro... Reedville... Selma... Morgan Point Recreation Area... Yukon... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CST for southeastern Arkansas.
